name: Head and Shoot
description:
It is a small one-on-one soccer game. You are Cristiano Ronaldo and your opponent is Lionel Messi(Bot). We have three different modes to play.

Use the arrow keys to move and jump. Use the space bar to shoot. 

It is just a start to my big project of Head and Shoot. I am going to upload a Champions league version of my game really soon. 

So, Please follow me, and if you like my game you can donate some amount so that I can make an even better version of Head and Shoot.

If you have any suggestions and feedbacks please comment.

Thank you for playing.
